message: Starting API design analysis. First reading current get_agent_output implementation to understand existing functionality.

Analyzed current get_agent_output implementation at real_mcp_server.py:1636. Current API only takes task_id and agent_id, reads from tmux session. Now designing enhanced API with tail, filter, and format parameters.

API design complete in api_design.md. Documented comprehensive get_agent_output enhancement with tail/filter/format parameters, backward compatibility strategy, efficient algorithms, and 6 detailed use cases. Ready for implementation phase.

API design completed and documented. Deliverables: (1) Complete API specification in api_design.md with function signature, parameters, return format. (2) Efficient tail algorithm design (O(k) complexity). (3) Filter semantics (regex, applied before tail). (4) Three format options (text/jsonl/parsed). (5) Backward compatibility strategy with tmux fallback. (6) Six detailed use cases. (7) Integration recommendations coordinated with current_implementation_investigator findings. Design is implementation-ready.
